resources.string: You must fill all the fields

The eighties ship is the most exclusive musical and tourist experience,
Original and fun you can live. More than 3 hours a day of live concerts, 5 hours each night of sessions and parties with the best DJs. playing the best music of the 80s and 3 spectacular “POOL PARTIES”

Prices per person based on the chosen category and occupation all adults. Port fees € 200 per passenger Service fee to be paid directly on the boat € 72 per passenger. Triple and quadruple with children under 17) 2 adults pay double fare in corresponding category and each child 250 + fees. Children always accompanied by 2 adults. Access to all facilities, activities and entertainment programs of the cruise. 2nd dinner shift. COMPLETE PENSION regimen with many appointments throughout the day: coffee on deck for the early risers, breakfast, lunch, afternoon tea, pizza and snack, dinner and midnight gastronomic surprises. (Does not include drinks) Access and participation in all sessions, parties, activities and private concerts organized exclusively for passengers of EL BARCO OCHENTERO 2019 (The rest of the passage has no access)
"List of contacts that we're totally not selling to anybody"
